nodes.bodyText: I debated on this to be honest.  My thinking is that the existing behavior doesn't support sorting, and if sorting is enabled but the proper mapping isn't set up (which is specific to each WFS source), queries are going to fail.  GeoServer at least will fail any query with a sort property it doesn't know about.  For example, if you fail to map the "created" attribute OR there is no proper mapping, all queries with a "created" sort will simply fail.  So I figured it was safer to leave it disabled by default.
